[Lightning Snares](/Feats.aspx?ID=527) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 175 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Snarecrafter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=78) (Level 14)

**Prerequisites**
Master in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4); [Quick Snares](/Feats.aspx?ID=509); [Snare Specialist](/Feats.aspx?ID=506)

</column>

---

You can rig a trap with incredible speed. When you create a snare that normally takes 1 minute to Craft, you can Craft it using a single Interact action instead.
